page.title: 18 TRANSPORT
page.content:
ROADS: As the area is mainly residential,the main feature are the many small roads leading to the houses. The main roads through the area are Warstock Road and School Road. Lorries going to the factory estate on Warstock Road use the main Alcester Road South from the city centre.
RAIL: The railway line in the area is between Yardley Wood Station and Shirley Station. This is part of the main line from Birmingham Moor Street to Stratford-Upon-Avon.
CANAL: The Stratford-Upon-Avon canal is used for leisure activities,for example,barge trips, fishing and canoeing. The canal triangle Stratford-Severn-Avon is now open.
